Specifiche esperienze professionali cara.content: Revisore per le seguenti riviste: Computational Statistics and Data Analysis Econometrics and Statistics Economia Politica Empirical Economics European Journal of Finance Giornale degli economisti e Annali di Economia Journal of Applied Econometrics Journal of Econometrics Journal of Empirical Finance Journal of International Money and Finance Journal of Royal Statistical Society, series B Mathematics and Computers in Simulation Quantitative Finance RISEC Rivista Italiana degli Economisti Stochastic Models and Applications
Senior research officer presso il Joint Research Center, Unit B.1"Economy and Finance".

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Relatore alla 13th International Conference on Panel Data, Cambridge (UK) "Euro corporate bond risk factors"
Relatore all'International Workshop on COMPUTATIONAL AND FINANCIAL ECONOMETRICS Geneva, (CH) April 20-22, 2007 "Persistence and seasonality in intradaily volatilities of stock index futures"
Relatore alla 2nd International Workshop on Computational and Financial Econometrics (CFE'08), Neuchatel (CH) "Model and distribution uncertainty in multivariate GARCH estimation"
Relatore a The Econometric Society European Meeting, Milano. "Long memory and periodicity of stock index futures"

Relatore invitato alla International conference della SIS (Società Italiana di Statistica) "Statistical methods for the analysis of large data-sets" "Long memory and tail dependence in trading volume and volatility "
Relatore alla 4th CSDA International Conference on Computational and Financial Econometrics (CFE'10), London (UK) "Inference on long memory in volatility with noisy realized measures"
Relatore al XII Workshop of Quantitative Finance, Padova.
Relatore al The Econometric Society European Meeting, 2011, Oslo (Norvegia). ESTIMATING CONDITIONAL JUMPS IN VOLATILITY USING REALIZED-RANGE MEASURES
Relatore alla 7th Conference on Statistical Computation and Complex Systems (S.Co.), September 19 21, 2011. "Conditional jumps in volatility and their economic determinants"

Relatore alla 5th CSDA International Conference on Computational and Financial Econometrics (CFE'11), Londra (UK). "Indirect inference for long memory stochastic volatility model with high-frequency data" Organizzatore (con Massimiliano Caporin) della sessione su HIGH FREQUENCY DATA MODELING

Relatore alla 6th CSDA International Conference on Computational and Financial Econometrics, Oviedo (Spagna), 2012 "Multiplicative error model with jumps" Organizzatore della sessione su JUMPS IN PRICES AND VOLATILITIES (CS10)
Relatore alla 19th International Conference on Panel Data , London (UK). "A Two-Stage Estimator for Heterogeneous Panel Models with Common Factors"

Relatore alla 7th International Conference on Computational and Financial Econometrics, Londra "A fast model averaging method to forecast high dimensional realized covariance matrices" Organizzatore della sessione su FORECASTING A LARGE DIMENSIONAL COVARIANCE MATRIX
Membro del Program Committee del 6th Italian Congress of Econometrics and Empirical Economics, Salerno, 2015.
Relatore al XV Workshop on Quantitative Finance, Florence, 2014. "Chasing volatility: a persistent multiplicative error model with jumps"
Relatore alla SoFiE Workshop on "Skewness, Heavy Tails, Market Crashes, and Dynamics", Cambridge, 2014. "Chasing Volatility: a Persistent Multiplicative Error Model with Jumps"
Relatore alla Conference on Indirect Estimation Methods in Finance and Economics, Allensbach, Lake Constance, Germany, 2014. "Indirect Inference with Time Series Observed with Error"
Membro del Program Committee dell' 8th International Conference on Computational and Financial Econometrics,2014, Pisa.
Membro del Program Committee dell' 8th International Conference on Computational and Financial Econometrics,2014, Pisa.

Relatore alla 8th International Conference on Computational and Financial Econometrics, Pisa, 6-8/12/2014 "Nonlinear volatility dynamics: a smooth transition HAR approach" Organizzatore della sessione su MIDAS MODELS: APPLICATIONS IN ECONOMICS AND FINANCE (CS70)

Relatore alla 8th International Conference on Computational and Financial Econometrics, Pisa, 6-8/12/2014 "Nonlinear volatility dynamics: a smooth transition HAR approach" Organizzatore della sessione su MIDAS MODELS: APPLICATIONS IN ECONOMICS AND FINANCE (CS70)
Relatore alla Annual Conference della International Applied Econometrics Association. University of Macedonia - Thessaloniki (Grecia) "Indirect inference with time series observed with error"

Relatore alla 9th International Conference on Computational and Financial Econometrics (CFE 2015), Londra "Stock market volatility and economic variables: A nonlinear approach" Organizzatore della sessione su VOLATILITY MODELS (C0500)
Membro del Program Committee del 7th Italian Congress of Econometrics and Empirical Economics, Messina, 2017.

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Docente presso il CORIPE Piemonte e il Real Collegio (Moncalieri) dei seguenti corsi: 1999-2009 "Econometrics", Master in Finance. 1999-2009 "Econometrics for financial markets", Master in Finance. 2001-2005 "Econometrics II", Master in Economics.
Centro Interuniversitario di Econometria (CIdE): Coordinator of the Time Series Econometrics summer school for PhD students.
MIP Politecnico di Milano: docente di " Econometrics for financial markets" nel corso master Quantitative Finance.
Corso su "Financial volatility measurement" presso la Moscow School of Economics.

Responsabilita' scientifica per progetti.content: Responsabile Scientifico dell'Unità di Ricerca PRIN (2006) “The use of high-frequency data for the analysis of interdependencies among volatilities, volumes and financial returns”
Responsabile scientifico dell'unità di ricerca PRIN (2004) "La struttura a termine dei tassi d’interesse e le variabili macroeconomiche "

Partecipazione al collegio dei docenti o.content: Supervisore delle tesi di Claudio Zucca, Luca Agnello, Paolo Santucci de Magistris presso il dottorato di Pavia Supervisione di Marie Silvere Mbomé presso il dottorato di Milano
Docente dei corsi di Econometrics e Time series econometrics nei dottorati di Pavia (Scienze economiche) e di Milano (Economics).
